CustomField.description: When converting SKU'd Bundles to it's component bundles, this is the % of $ amount of the bundle's price(s) to allocate to this component's price(s). If this is a $ amount, it will be subtracted from the bundle's price first, then the remaining amount spread across the component products based on their percentage (i.e. % values should always sum up to 100%). % values should be entered as percentage values ... i.e. '50' for 50%, not '0.50'.
CustomField.label: Bundle Split
